Row.Text: The Mavala is one of two Imbagalan unique units, replacing the Worker. It cannot be trained nor bought, but is only obtained by constructing Cultural buildings in your Cities, and when new Citizens are born in captured Cities. The Mavala provides a free [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen in the Kasanje City with the lowest population upon having expended all its uses.
